footer.crafter_html: The Art+Code Studio accepts that every client is unique, each project requires a different approach and that all projects need to be launched with an open mind. In order for us to do collaborate closely with our clients to discover the potential and erect a creative and beautiful solutions. Just drop us an email hi@artandcode.studio

404.content_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

cookies.title: Cookies we use
cookies.subtitle: To power up our online store we place the following cookies.

store.title: Cookies Necessary for the Functioning of the Store
store._ab: Used in connection with access to admin.
store._orig_referrer: Used in connection with shopping cart.
store._secure_session_id: Used in connection with navigation through a storefront.
store.Cart: Used in connection with shopping cart.
store.Secure_customer_sig: Used in connection with customer login.
store.storefront_digest: Used in connection with customer login.

shopify_analytics.title: Reporting and Analytics by Shopify
shopify_analytics._shopify_sa_p: Shopify analytics relating to marketing & referrals.
shopify_analytics._shopify_sa_t: Shopify analytics relating to marketing & referrals.

google_analytics.title: Google Analytics
google_analytics._gat_html: Used to throttle request rate. If Google Analytics is deployed via Google Tag Manager, this cookie will be named _dc_gtm_<property-id>.
google_analytics.AMP_TOKEN: Contains a token that can be used to retrieve a Client ID from AMP Client ID service. Other possible values indicate opt-out, inflight request or an error retrieving a Client ID from AMP Client ID service.
google_analytics._gac_property-id_html: Contains campaign related information for the user. If you have linked your Google Analytics and Google Ads accounts, Google Ads website conversion tags will read this cookie unless you opt-out. Learn more.

ttd.title: The Trade Desk
ttd.description_html:
For information on the technology used by The Trade Desk and privacy, visit the following link: http://thetradedesk.com/general/privacy-policy

You can contradict the data storage at any time with future effect by following the link: http://www.adsrvr.org/
ttd.TTDOptOut: Opt Out for The Trade Desk analytics.

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.description_html: To save your privacy settings we use the following cookies.
privacy.cookieconsent_accepted: If you agree with our cookie notice this will be saved so we do not to show you the notice again.
privacy.ga-disable-UA-126476233-1: Used to save the setting that you do not want tracking with Google Analytics.
privacy.TTDOptOut: Used to save the setting that you do not want tracking with The Trade Desk.
privacy.fb-pixel-is-disabled: Used to save the setting that you do not want tracking with Facebook Pixel.

pinterest.title: Pinterest Tracking
pinterest.description_html: For information on the technology used by Pinterest and privacy, visit the following link: help.pinterest.com/en/business/article/pinterest-tag-parameters-and-cookies
pinterest._pinterest_sess: The Pinterest login cookie. Contains user id(s), authentication token(s), timestamp, etc.  If the user is logged out, authentication tokens are deleted, but we still leave the cookie present; we use the (logged out) user ids to optimize the user experience and measurement.
pinterest._pinterest_ct: This is the equivalent of the _pinterest_sess cookie for our in-app browser.  This cookie is set in Pinner's in-app browser is set whenever the Pinner views offsite content (e.g. a 3rd party website) from within the Pinterest app.
pinterest._pinterest_ct_mw: This is set whenever offsite content (e.g. a 3rd party website) is loaded in Pinner's mobile browser (e.g. Safari).  The Pinterest App opens content in the Pinner's mobile browser (instead of the in-app browser) whenever the Pinner clicks the "Open in â€¦" button.  Also, we occasionally redirect the Pinner to the mobile browser (rather than in-app browser) experience.
pinterest._pinterest_ct_rt: This is set whenever the Pinner visits an Advertiser's site which has the Pinterest Tag installed.
